title: Munnar Tea Gardens
description: Vast tea plantations with scenic landscapes and cool climate.

title: Alleppey Backwaters
description: Famous network of canals, lagoons, and lakes with houseboat cruises.

title: Fort Kochi
description: Historic town known for colonial architecture and vibrant culture.

title: Varkala Beach
description: Cliffside beach famous for sunsets, cliffs, and cliff-top cafes.

title: Athirappilly Waterfalls
description: Spectacular waterfall known as the ‘Niagara of India’.

title: Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary
description: Famous wildlife sanctuary with elephants, tigers, and boat rides.

title: Padmanabhaswamy Temple
description: Ancient temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu with stunning architecture.

title: Bekal Fort
description: Historic seaside fort with a scenic beach and watchtowers.
